name: Ramayana Resort & Spa
priceRange: Compare Average Prices from Our Partners Starting at $56 Per Night

reviews.review: After a month roaming Bali, we wanted our last four days to be central and just chilling by the pool. We were in a room that faced the street front, and the bar noise from below and across the road is VERY loud till about...

We booked this hotel for our honeymoon. When booked we were not advised that there was building work commencing and we did not find out this until we arrived and both looked out of the window/balcony and got a message sent whilst we were in...

reviews.quotes: Renovation on going. Very noisey at the moment
reviews.review: I would have given it a 5* rating had it not been for the major renovation taking place. Nowhere in my time of booking was that ever mentioned. Not sure how long it will go on for. Besides the renovation, this hotel was wonderful to...

This hotel should not be taking guests whilst under renovation. at the very least should make guests aware before accepting bookings of what is closed down. Expecting beautiful gardens and pool. no gardens, as they and the main pool are in the renovation zone behind...

This is my second stay here. Great resort staff and location. Breakfast was good .Close to everything there is renovating going on but did not bother me. I recommend this Resort ,as it has everything you need to relax and enjoy your vacation

I stayed for a night here. The hotel is undergoing major renovation and it is really bad. Entrance: The main entrance was closed and there was no proper indication to guide guests to the lobby. I had to drop off at the road side to...

We stay for 3 nights in family room. The room is spacious, nice and clean eventhough the lights are too dark for me. The highlight on this hotel is the amazing location !! it's near everything, the beach, mall, club, restaurant, traditional market. All of...

reviews.quotes: 1 night staying in transit between flights...
reviews.review: The hotel is in renovation and reveals the aged in room's equipment... the reception in last floor and is not convinient for an earlier check-out. Also the transfer to airport is too much expensive compairing with others similars hotel's around.

The breakfast is a very big and nice buffet but hashbrowns & muffins & cakes are dry and It’s like eating cardboard. The rooms are very big and nice they have everything you need safety deposit box DVD player fridge mini bar The only thing...

This is our second stay in this hotel. We like the location. The hotel is nice and clean. Unfortunately the second time was under renovation and was a bit noisy but even that didn’t stop us to have great time. The staff are so friendly...

We booked this hotel last year, well in advance for our holiday this July. We were not warned from the hotel or our booking agent that the hotel was having a major referb, We were shown our room which had a only one socket for...

Although we couldn’t fault the lovely staff, the major renovations (not disclosed at time of booking direct with hotel) and very run down facilities were bitterly disappointing. We were so looking forward to our Honeymoon at Ramayana having admired it from afar over the years,...

The main reason our family to choose this hotel when stayed in Bali last month is the location. It is very near with some interesting places. The Kuta Beach, Kuta Square, Kuta Traditional Market are several steps away from the hotel. The food also delicious....

My first time to Bali and this place was a little touch of paradise!! Our room was everything I was promised, comfortable, spacious, clean and in a perfect spot. Daily housekeeping was so nice and the laundry service was excellent too. The staff were extremely...

The location is just hard to beat, in the middle of Kuta. Close to Kuta Square, Waterbom, etc. Room is pretty decent and clean. The pool is having a good water quality so my daughter loves playing there.

We stayed here last year and loved it so much we came back for two weeks we are currently here as I right this staff are great and nothing’s a problem breakfast is nice and you eat it in a beautiful restaurant over looking the...

reviews.quotes: Great value, close to airport and hustle and bustle of Kuta
reviews.review: I spent a night here at the end of a week in Seminyak. It's a very clean and comfortable hotel and the staff were terrific. I had some trouble with noise from a nearby bar and they moved me to another room without hesitation. It...
